title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6027.10 - Term and renewal of curriculum approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6027.10 - Term and renewal of curriculum approval

State Regulations

The security guard training course approval shall be
valid for a period of three years, provided that the council has not made any
substantive changes to the curriculum as set forth in this Part. Such approval
may be renewed by a school director upon filing of a copy of the curriculum in
use at that time with the commissioner and approval by the commissioner in
accordance with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6027.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
